subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Sandra Gal of Germany shot a two-under-par 71 to edge Jiyai Shin of South Korea by a stroke and win the Kia Classic in City of Industry, Calif., the first L.P.G.A. Tour event in the United States this year.
